overview_of_class:
This course covers the definition of a function; trigonometric, exponential, logarithmic and inverse
functions; graphs, limits, continuity; derivative of a function; product, quotient and chain rule; implicit differentiation; linear approximation and differentials; related rates; mean value theorems; curve
plotting; optimization problems; Newton's method; and antiderivatives.
name: Differential Calculus of One Variable Functions
subject: MATH
